# minecraft Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "minecraft" {
  address  = "localhost:27015"
  password = "password"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `address` (String) The RCON address of the Minecraft server
- `password` (String) The RCON address of the Minecraft server
